1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Koshucode output.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Writer.Koshu
7  ( resultKoshu,
8    resultKoshu2,
9    resultKoshuTab,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified Control.Monad                       as M
13import qualified System.IO                           as IO
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture            as O
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                as B
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                as T
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax              as S
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core                as C
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Writer.Judge        as W
20
21-- | Koshucode writer.
22resultKoshu :: (B.MixEncode c) => C.ResultWriter c
23resultKoshu = resultKoshu2
24
25-- | Koshucode writer with two-space separator.
26--   This function uses 'D.judgeMix2'.
27resultKoshu2 :: (B.MixEncode c) => C.ResultWriter c
28resultKoshu2 = C.ResultWriterChunk "koshu-2" $ hPutKoshu (T.judgeBreak, T.judgeMix2)
29
30-- | Koshucode writer with tab separator.
31--   This function uses 'D.judgeMixTab'.
32resultKoshuTab :: (B.MixEncode c) => C.ResultWriter c
33resultKoshuTab = C.ResultWriterChunk "koshu-tab" $ hPutKoshu (B.crlfBreak, T.judgeMixTab)
34
35hPutKoshu :: (B.MixEncode c) => (B.LineBreak, T.EncodeJudge S.Chars c) -> C.ResultWriterChunk c
36hPutKoshu output h result status sh =
37    do -- head
38       B.when (C.resultPrintHead result) $ hPutHead h result
39       hPutLicense h result
40       hPutEcho h result
41       -- body
42       let cnt = W.judgeCount $ C.resultClass result
43       cnt' <- M.foldM (hPutShortChunk output h result) cnt sh
44       -- foot
45       B.when (C.resultPrintFoot result) $ hPutFoot h status cnt'
46       return status
47
48hPutHead :: IO.Handle -> C.Result c -> IO ()
49hPutHead h result =
50    do IO.hPutStrLn h B.emacsModeComment
51       O.hPutLines  h $ B.texts $ comm inputs
52       O.hPutLn     h
53    where
54      inputs = C.inputPoint  `map` C.resultInput result
55      itext  = B.ioPointText `map` inputs
56      otext  = B.ioPointText $ C.resultOutput result
57
58      comm _ | itext == [otext]
59             = B.CommentDoc [ B.CommentSec "INPUT / OUTPUT" itext ]
60      comm [B.IOPointCustom _ _]
61             = B.CommentDoc [ B.CommentSec "INPUT / OUTPUT" itext ]
62      comm _ = B.CommentDoc [ B.CommentSec "INPUT"  itext
63                            , B.CommentSec "OUTPUT" [otext] ]
64
65hPutLicense :: IO.Handle -> C.Result c -> IO ()
66hPutLicense h C.Result { C.resultLicense = ls }
67    | null ls    = return ()
68    | otherwise  = do mapM_ put ls
69                      IO.hPutStrLn h "=== rel"
70                      O.hPutLn     h
71    where
72      put license =
73          do IO.hPutStrLn h "=== license"
74             O.hPutLn     h
75             O.hPutLines  h license
76             O.hPutLn     h
77
78hPutEcho :: IO.Handle -> C.Result c -> IO ()
79hPutEcho h result =
80    do let echo = C.resultEcho result
81       O.hPutLines h (O.tString <$> concat echo)
82       B.when (echo /= []) $ O.hPutLn h
83
84hPutFoot :: IO.Handle -> B.ExitCode -> W.JudgeCount -> IO ()
85hPutFoot h status cnt = B.hPutMix B.crlfBreak h $ W.judgeSummary status cnt
86
87
88-- ----------------------  Chunk
89
90hPutShortChunk
91    :: (B.MixEncode c) => (B.LineBreak, T.EncodeJudge S.Chars c) -> IO.Handle -> C.Result c
92    -> W.JudgeCount -> C.ShortResultChunks c -> IO W.JudgeCount
93hPutShortChunk output h result cnt (S.Short _ def chunks) =
94    do hPutShort h def
95       hPutChunks output h result (S.shortText (t <$> def)) chunks cnt
96    where
97      t (a, b) = (O.stringT a, O.stringT b)
98
99hPutShort :: IO.Handle -> [S.ShortDef String] -> IO ()
100hPutShort _ [] = return ()
101hPutShort h def =
102    do O.hPutLines h $ "short" : map shortLine def
103       O.hPutLn    h
104    where
105      shortLine :: (String, String) -> String
106      shortLine (a, b) = "  " ++ O.padEnd width a ++
107                         " "  ++ show b
108      width :: Int
109      width = maximum $ map (length . fst) def
110
111-- | Output result chunk.
112hPutChunks
113    :: (B.MixEncode c)
114    => (B.LineBreak, T.EncodeJudge S.Chars c) -> IO.Handle -> C.Result c -> B.TransText S.Chars
115    -> [C.ResultChunk c] -> W.JudgeCount -> IO W.JudgeCount
116hPutChunks (lb, encode) h result sh = loop where
117    loop [] cnt                            = return cnt
118    loop (C.ResultJudge js : xs) (_, tab)  =
119        case W.judgesCountMix result (encode sh) js (B.mixEmpty, 0, tab) of
120          (mx, cnt', tab') -> do B.hPutMix lb h mx
121                                 loop xs (cnt', tab')
122    loop (C.ResultNote [] : xs) cnt        = loop xs cnt
123    loop (C.ResultNote ls : xs) cnt        = do hPutNote h ls
124                                                loop xs cnt
125    loop (C.ResultRel _ _ : xs) cnt        = loop xs cnt
126
127hPutNote :: IO.Handle -> [String] -> IO ()
128hPutNote h ls =
129    do IO.hPutStrLn h "=== note"
130       O.hPutLn     h
131       O.hPutLines  h ls
132       O.hPutLn     h
133       IO.hPutStrLn h "=== rel"
134       O.hPutLn     h
135
